meanings.sent1: She always made sure her clothes were unrumpled before going out.
meanings.sent2: The unrumpled bedsheet looked neat and tidy in the morning.
meanings.sent3: Even after a long journey, his hat remained unrumpled.
meanings.sent4: Her unrumpled hair flowed smoothly in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The unrumpled paper had a pristine appearance.

meanings.definition: Smoothed out or flattened without creases
meanings.sent1: The tailor did a great job in making the fabric unrumpled.
meanings.sent2: After ironing, the shirt looked unrumpled and ready to wear.
meanings.sent3: The unrumpled carpet felt soft underfoot.
meanings.sent4: The unrumpled flag fluttered gracefully in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The unrumpled map was easy to read and navigate with.
